white: The Deathly Hallows, only rainbow-colored for some reason.
A group of very angry Veela.
Salazar Slytherin wearing a fabulous ballgown.
Hermione's ability to pummel you into submission with her breadth of knowledge.
Professor Binns literally boring people  to death.
Using Mudblood like it's a sentence enhancement.
Trying to tame one's half-giant brother.
Dean Thomas holding a bouquet of flowers just for you.
Snape wearing a fake twirly mustache.
Filch and Mrs. Norris dancing the tango.
Give your right hand to serve your master...literally.
Gilderoy Lockhart's new book about learning to love himself again.
A rat in every definition of the word.
Percy Weasley's smug sense of superiority.
Professor Trewlaney's half-empty bottle of sherry.
Bill Weasley's sense of impeccable coolness.
Hedwig with a sarcastic look on her feathery face.
A thousand simultaneously hopping chocolate frogs.
Oliver Wood riding two brooms at the same time.
Professor Snape wearing Neville's gran's things.
George Weasley with a Beater bat.
Living in a closet under some stairs.
Voldemort's face on the back of your head.
Madam Rosmerta in a fighting mood.
Luna Lovegood's interest in invisible creatures.
Parvati and Padma Patel throwing epic shade.
Dobby with a gatling sock gun.
Lee Jordon exposing your deepest secrets in the middle of a Quidditch Match.
Shackles in the dungeons to hang naughty students until they're sorry.
A time turner that only goes back in time five seconds.
Pansy Parkinson with a real pug's nose.
Katie Bell throwing a cursed necklace at your unmentionables.
A howler from your spurned lover.
The ghosts of Lily, James, Sirius, and Remus.
A hug from a Venomous Tentacula.
Professor Slughorn with a tummy ache from eating too many pieces of sugared pineapple.
Rita Skeeter in bug form...only human sized.
A horcrux made out of bellybutton lint.
Insults generated by the Marauder's Map.
Kiss Snape on the tip of his nose.
Hug Crookshanks until he squeaks indignantly.
Angelina in the most amazing dress you've ever seen.
A portkey made out of belly button lint.
Dolores Umbridge wearing a bikini made of live rats.
Dumbledore wearing far too much glitter and far too little else.
The tiny flap of skin on Nearly-Headless Nick's neck.
Fred Weasley with a spinning bowtie.
Your reflection in the Mirror of Erised.
Professor Sprout with a screaming baby mandrake in each hand.
Uses for Skele-Grow outside its intended purpose.
Arthur Weasley's interest in all things Muggle.
Marcus Flint's habit of sneering in the mirror every morning to make sure he's got it right.
A partially-transfigured rat that secretly happens to be an animagus.
Neville Longbottom being locked out of Gryffindor Tower while a murderer is on the loose.
Seamus Finnigan and a mysterious explosion that is totally his fault but he has plausible deniability.
Colin Creevy's secret magical photo development lab.
Blaise Zabini in an impeccable three piece suit.
Padfoot in the middle of a bath.
A kiss from the Giant Squid.
Cornelius Fudge's secret Chocolate Frog card collection.
Gellert Grindelwald's dark, rather steamy past.
The complete list of Wizard Swears.
Vomiting slugs for at least three hours.
A very embarrassed (and pissed off) werewolf.
The Sorting Hat after its had one too many firewhiskeys.
Scratching tabby-Minerva under the chin and calling her a "good pud pud".
Fawkes farting fire after eating too many refried beans.
Crabbe and Goyle after they've had one too many cupcakes.
Dumbledore's Army after a couple of pints.
